text: I ordered the product after reading Rocco Dispirito's Now Eat This Diet book. I found a recipe that called for the shirataki noodles and was intrigued about the no calories, no carbs, no nothing part.... I read all the one star reviews after ordering and was a little concern because of the comments on the texture and taste... I can understand why people have a bad experience with these noodles, if not cooked with a good recipe they may taste weird... but I cooked a recipe called Rich Beef and Noodle Pho with Lime and Bean Sprouts and the noodles were delicious! I just found my miracle!
